features: 👍BONDED LEATHER CHAIR, DESIGN FOR THE COMFORT: Not all artificial leather is created equally. This executive desk chair is upholstered in bonded leather that is resistant to scratches, stains, peeling, and cracking. With upholstered armrests and an elegant design look, this boss chair will complement your home or office perfectly

👍INFLATABLE LUMBAR SUPPORT: You can use the airbag to inflate the lumbar area of the chair, which will provide you with effective support. It will greatly enhance your sitting experience, no more pain or fatigue during long hours of gaming or working

👍FLIP-UP ARM DESIGN:Flip-up arms offer an arm-less option without detaching anything,which gives comfort and support for your arms and shoulders. 90°rotation design which allows the chair can fit under the desk for space saving

👍SYNCHRO TILT&TENSION CONTROL: Simple pneumatic controls let you raise or lower your seat and rock back in your chair. Pull out the handle (right side of the chair) to tilt back, push in to stop tilting. Underneath tilt tension knob controls the tension of reclining, you can adjust it to your personal preferences

👍SOLID CONSTRUCTION,CERTIFIED COMFORT: 360-degree swivel, heavy-duty nylon base and smooth-rolling casters for great stability and mobility. BIFIMA certification,more reliable and sturdy, maximum capacity up to 275 lbs

👍RISK-FREE PURCHASE,BUY WITH CONFIDENCE!--Complete customer satisfaction is our top priority! If you have any questions about our products, please do not hesitate to contact us by email(The contact info is included in the manual ), we will spare no effort to assist you to solve any problem! Click to Add Cart Now!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ENHANCE YOUR WORK SET-UP WITH PROFESSIONAL OFFICE DESK CHAIR COLAMY OFFICE CHAIR, YOUR PROFESSIONAL CHOICE A comfortable office chair can create more pleasure for you when you work. COLAMY high back leather chair is a great executive office chair with advanced ergonomic design and investment in material, soft and thick leather ensures that even after 8 hours of work your body will not be too tired. What's more, adjustable lumbar support makes this chair's lumbar support really adjustable. Everyone can get the best sitting experience in this chair

FULLY ADJUSTABLE OFFICE CHAIR CUSTOMIZABLE LUMBAR SUPPORT Simple pneumatic controls let you raise or lower your seat and rock back in your chair. Pull out the handle (right side of the chair) to tilt back, push in to stop tilting. Underneath tilt tension knob controls the tension of reclining, you can adjust it to your personal preferences. Adjustable lumbar support, you can press the airbag to inflate the lumbar area of the chair, providing the most suitable support according your needs. Seat Height: 18.6-22.4 inches Back Tilt Angle: 90°-110°

Thick Padded Headrest Thickened headrest offers the ultimate soft support for your neck, effectively relieving the stiffness and soreness caused by long-time sitting Flip-up Armrests Soft faux leather padded armrests for enhanced forearm comfort. 90°rotation design which allows the chair can fit under the desk for space saving Built-in Lumbar Support A real adjustable lumbar support. Press the airbag to inflate the lumbar area of the chair, which will provide more effective support for lower back Rock Back and Forth Rock back and forth between 90-110 degrees. Give the user maximum control over every aspect of their posture for muti-task convenience

Thicken Seat Cushion Double padded cushion makes the chair incredibly soft and comfortable for the best possible experience Built-in Linner Spring Built-in spring pockets create the same elasticity and comfort as a sofa or mattress. Provide strong support while sitting Height Adjustor & Tilt Knob Seat Height: 18.7"-22.4" Underneath tilt tension knob controls the tension of reclining Smooth Rolling Casters 360-degree swivel nylon casters, more flexible for swivel rolling and smooth to move. Won't scratch the floor

What is the max weight can it hold? 275LBS Is this chair easy to assemble? Yes, it usually takes only 10-15 minutes. And there is a detailed manual instruction Can this office chair sit comfortably for a full work day? No problem, this is an ergonomic chair. And the adjustable lumbar support creates more power for the comfortable work of a day How can I get after-sales service? The contact info is included in the manual. Your message will be replied within 24 hours

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect chair for every size
reviews.reviewText: The chair was very easy to set up. It’s really good quality and will definitely last you years. The chair is not noisy and the wheels slide smoothly. The chair is pretty big so it’s perfect if you’re tall . It has very good back support do homework for hours at a time and this chair has been a big help . I would recommend it if you are looking for something comfortable to study/work and also because it’s a nice looking chair looks great in my room .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great chair for the price!
reviews.reviewText: We didn’t want chairs from a local office supply store due to expense so we thought we would try this out. This chair it’s actually very comfortable and appears to be a very good quality. I like the fact that you can increase the lumbar support or decrease it at any time. I do wish the back was able to set up a little bit more straight, but with pumping the lumbar all the way up that helps. I am 5’2” and this has a great range of heighth to adjust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly good deal
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical about making this purchase because too many good reviews often turn out to be too good to be true. In this case, I was pleasantly surprised. The chair was very easy to assemble thanks to a YouTube video. To my surprise, I put it together entirely on my own in around half an hour. As importantly, the chair is very comfortable, providing in particular the lower back I desperately need. Before I bought the office chair, I used one of the chairs that came with a dining room seat I've had for 20 years. No arrangement of pillows ever made that chair comfortable to work in for six or seven hours a day, five days a week. The office chair, however, is a game-changer both in terms of my physical comfort and my disposition (a physically comfortable worker is a happier worker). What's more, because the arms are collapsible, the chair slides right under the kitchen table that doubles as my desk. I have only one complaint about the chair: It's not leather, as advertised. It's a cheaper, less durable fabric. This means you have to be very careful about scratching it, puncturing it, even cleaning it (the instructions that come with it say this, too). Other than that, the chair is very comfortable and a good deal for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality great price
reviews.reviewText: Great office chair especially for bigger people. Super comfy and made of very nice materials all around. It was really easy to put together and carry so I’m happy about that. I got it for my brother who is a gamer and it’s amazing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Office Chair Ever!
reviews.reviewText: Comfort: 5 Stars. When sitting at a desk for hours upon end, this chair fits the bill. It is firm, yet comfortable. When I sit at my other desk with a different chair, my behind hurts within minutes, and that's even with a supportive cushion. The lumbar adjustment is the hidden gem. The armrests are also very comfortable and at the right height, but some may complain because the height is not adjustable.Adjustments: 5 Stars. Although it doesn't have all the bells and whistles when it comes to adjustments, it does have the basics. There is a lot of vertical travel and reclining travel as well. I haven't had a need to adjust the tension as it seems just right from the box.Appearance: 5 Stars. The pleather appears rich, and the white contrasting stitching highlights the appearance. I didn't think I would like the stitching, but it gives the appearance of quality, much like the hand-sewn stitching in the lapel of a quality suit. The fit and finish is suburb.Assembly: 5 Stars again. I figured pretty much everything out without the instructions. It took me about 30-40 minutes to put it together in a dimly lit room. I discovered that you could scan a QR code to view an instruction video. They give you spare screws and a spare cap along with a tool. Everything was wrapped securely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This chair is fantastic!
reviews.reviewText: The product when I received it was easy to assemble, and it was amazingly comfortable. I did run into a couple of problems, but the company fixed the issue immediately, and I am incredibly happy with this product! 5 star rating all the way around!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most comfortable adjustable office chair ever
reviews.reviewText: After spinal surgery I needed something with good lumbar support and that was adjustable. I’ve had this for 3 months now and wouldn’t trade it for any other. I’ve worked in offices for 30 years and this is the best. Washable so it always looks pristine even after a coffee spill!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The photos don’t do it justice, feels and looks like real leather!!
reviews.reviewText: I was shocked at how great this chair looks in person for being so inexpensive. At $89 this is such a good deal. I needed a chair with arms that fold up so I can tuck the chair under the desk and give me more room next to my bed. The chair I had was bulky and took up a ton of space. This one is sleek, compact, yet stylish and comfortable. It looks and feels like high quality leather, not thin vinyl like most cheap office chairs. I am going to have to buy this chair for my son’s dorm room now. I was going to give him my prior chair, but now I realize what a space saver it will be to have this type of chair for an already cramped dorm room.

reviews.reviewTitle: リクライニングとファンクション
reviews.reviewText: リクライニングと前後に９０～１１０度ファンクション出来るとありましたが、実際には出来ない外国製なので説明書が英語表記で翻訳してその通りに操作しても、出来ない。連絡しようとしても、返信が来ない
